course_title: Spec. Tops in Sociology: Work and Occupations
class_notes: This course is the introduction to the sociological studies of work-related issues at both the macro level (e.g., the U.S. and global economics, occupational structure, changes of technology) and the micro level (e.g., the dynamics individual workers' attributes shape and are shaped by work).
course_description: A seminar or lecture series on topics of special sociological concern.
sections:
